description:
Terry absolutely loves surfing. He grew up with a lot of snow, but recently moved to a more tropical climate and now spends most of his time surfing the ocean waves. He's got an innocent smile and sweet face. I actually thought he was going to be very shy at first but he was actually a bit of an exhibitionist.
From front to back, Terry has some great muscle definition and he was happy we noticed. His face lit up when we commented on how nice his arms are!
"How do you like to jerk off? Do you have a favorite position or a favorite place?"
"When I was younger, I used to do it in the shower," he replied.
"Really? Maybe we should throw you in the shower then..."
"Shower looks pretty nice," he said with a big smile on his face.
I could tell that this experience was really turning him on. He was rock hard and he enjoyed being watched. So much so that after getting dried up, he shot a huge load all over his chest that almost landed in his mouth!
title: Terry
